Description.Name: AC/2 Ammo (Overpower)
Description.Details: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. AC/2 Overpower Ammo contains a more powerful propellant charge and deals 10% increased damage, but generates +1 recoil. Overpower ammo bins contain 24 rounds of ammunition per ton. Ammunition type can be changed by clicking the middle of the weapons activation panel during combat if more than one type of ammunition is present. Explosion damage per ammo: 8
